manifest.name: hyper-autohide-tabs
manifest.description: Autohides the tab bar in hyperterm when there is only one tab
manifest.readme:
# hyper-autohide-tabs

This plugin autohides tab bar when there is only one tab.

![auto hiding](http://i.imgur.com/PVWCjO6.gif)

## Usage

Add plugin to `~/.hyper.js`:

```js
plugins: [
  'hyper-autohide-tabs'
]
```
